Better just call the error directly

                  self.imagePickerControllerDidCancel(self.imagePicker!)
          
          
            
                  self.call?.error("User cancelled photos app")
          
      
    
    
  

imagePickerControllerDidCancel should only be called by the delegate, and also it dismiss the imagePicker, but at this point it has not been presented.
